title: Muhammad Yunus on His Book "A World of Three Zeros"
itunes:title: Muhammad Yunus on His Book "A World of Three Zeros"
description:
(Bloomberg)--Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Muhammad Yunus\u0010Chairman/Founder\u0010Grameen America Inc\u0010Discussing his book "A World of Three Zeros: The New Economics of Zero Poverty, Zero Unemployment, and Zero Net Carbon Emissions."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
